full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I 'GREL CHEN RGYAN SNANG LAS BTUS PA'I NYER MKHO MDO DON LTA BA'I MIG 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @063A *, ,CES PA 'DI NI RIG GNAS RGYA MTSO LA MKHYEN RAB KYI 'JUG PA MCHOG TU YANGS PA YONGS KYI DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN CHEN PO AO THOG BKA' 'GYUR BA BLA MA DKON MCHOG SNYAN GRAGS KYIS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG GYIS ZHES BSKUL ZHING, GZHAN YANG DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS NAN TAN CHE BA'I NGOR, NGES PA DON GYI MKHAS GRUB CHEN PO RJE BTZUN BLA MA BLO BZANG DAR RGYAS DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS LAS 'PHAGS PA BRGYAD STONG PA'I BSHAD LUNG LEGS PAR MNOS PA'I BKA' DRIN GYIS 'TSO BA'I GYI NA PA DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS KYIS DPEN GNAS DGE LDAN CHOS SDINGS SU BRIS PA'O,, ,,AOm SVA STI, TSUL 'DI KHAL KHA JO NANG BE SE'I SHOG ,DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG BSTAN 'DZIN GYIS, ,CHOS SBYIN RGYA CHER SPEL BA'I LHAG BSAM GYIS, ,MTHUN RKYEN SBYAR TE PAR DU LEGS PAR BSGRUBS, ,LEGS BYAS 'DIS MTSON DUS GSUM DGE BA'I BTHUS, ,TSE RABS KUN TU DAL 'BYOR RTEN BRGYUD DE, ,DPAL LDAN BLA MAS DGYES BZHIN RJES BZUNG NAS, ,SMIN GROL LAM BZANG MYUR DU MTHAR PHYIN SHOG ,
author_simple: DBYANGS CAN DGA' BA'I BLO GROS,
